title: Strengthening data science practical competencies: Translation education program design to enhance gender equality awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic translation techniques and scientific text comprehension ability
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify three types of gender-biased language in scientific translation texts and propose gender-equal alternatives with 80% accuracy
Learners can complete translation projects (5 iterative revisions) reflecting peer feedback according to formative research methodologies
Learners can evaluate their own and peers' translation outputs with 85% agreement using gender-sensitivity assessment rubrics
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
